snippet: Felix Hernandez, the Mariners ace, was at the top of his game on Saturday as he faced the Yankees for the first time since he sent Alex Rodriguez to the disabled list on July 24.
abstract: Seattle Mariners beat the New York Yankees, 1-0; Mariners pitcher Felix Hernandez throws 101 pitches in the shutout, his third complete game of the season.
lead_paragraph: Felix Hernandez, the Mariners ace, was at the top of his game on Saturday as he faced the Yankees for the first time since he sent Alex Rodriguez to the disabled list on July 24.

headline.print_headline: Mariners’ Hernandez Stifles Yankees in Shutout
headline.seo: Mariners’ Felix Hernandez Stifles Yankees in Two-Hit Shutout
headline.main: Mariners’ Hernandez Stifles Yankees in Shutout
